title: New Champ Select Lagging, Forcing Dodges
body:
For the last few patches, the new champ select has consistently frozen with 0 seconds left for a person to pick their champion, whether it be my own pick or someone else's (also happens during bans). This freezing continues past my pick/ban, causing tons of unintentional dodges, as I'm unable to pick a champ or ban when needed to.
On a Mac btw.
Anyone got any ideas?

replies.body:
I'm on Windows with the same issue. I as well as others have reported this in the bugs section, but we have not received answers yet.

I say this so you can keep an eye on my thread/others' threads in case you don't get a helpful reply on yours. :)

If your game is crashing after champion select, check out my post, I found a solution!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/GxgHkzxh-mac-6364-match-wont-load-after-loading-screen-solution
happened to me twice in a row. Hello 30min ban because I did nothing wrong
Happens to me all the time and then I have to wait the 5 minutes afterwards it is so annoying
I have the same issue on windows XP!! And have not even been answered.
